chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Ila, p. 766—Wife of Raen, mother of Aram. A plump woman, gray-haired but not wrinkled. She is a head taller than her husband. She and Raen tend to the wounded at the Battle of Merrilor; both of them seem to have aged a decade in the last year. See also Aram; Raen.
